p: Dr. Koopmans emphasized the important role and the potential of surveillance by presenting preliminary results on arbovirus surveillance from the ARBO study and data from an influenza market surveillance in poultry in China ( Bai et al., 2019). She also pointed out a potential role for co-circulation of different viruses, e.g. Zika and dengue for new pathogenesis pathways ( Langerak et al., 2019).
